name: A Frog Took My Sister
description:
Take a trip back and enjoy this retro inspired Action/Puzzler. In a profound effort to save your sister from the dastardly frog, play through 15 diverse levels.

Controls: arrow keys, spacebar and mouse.

Requirements: Windows Vista or Higher

*Approx Gameplay Time = 30 mins -1 hour 30 mins+

*Depending on ability.
